settings.caption: Tested to meet the highest international standards
settings.heading: Premium Quality Fabrics You Can Trust
settings.text: Our fabric collection is crafted to deliver exceptional durability, comfort, and style. Each fabric undergoes rigorous testing and is approved in accordance with the Norwegian Møbelfakta quality requirements, ensuring top-notch performance and reliability. Møbelfakta certification is a mark of excellence, as it tests fabrics against Norwegian and international standards (NS, EN, and ISO) for strength, wear resistance, and safety. This means you can trust that our fabrics are built to last while maintaining their luxurious look and feel. Choose our certified fabrics for furniture that combines quality, durability, and elegance in every detail.

settings.caption: Creating Comfort Through Thoughtful Support
settings.heading: Relaxation is Not a Luxury- It’s Essential
settings.text:
True relaxation goes beyond simply having a soft place to sit or lie down. Whether it’s a chair, sleeper sofa, or recliner, the right furniture should provide continuous ergonomic support, keeping your body comfortable and well-aligned. Proper support helps prevent strain on your legs and back, reducing fatigue over time.

When your body is fully at ease, blood circulation improves, muscles relax, and your spine is naturally supported at the correct angles. This creates a sense of deep comfort and well-being, turning your living space into a haven where relaxation meets lasting health benefits.

settings.caption: Minimalist design, maximum environmental integrity.
settings.heading: Sustainability Woven into Every Design
settings.text:
At Fjords, sustainability starts with intentional design, not compromise. Their pieces are crafted using responsibly sourced wood, three distinct types of leather, and high-quality upholstery fabrics: each chosen to uphold environmental standards and build-lasting furniture.
Embracing minimalist aesthetics translates not only into timeless style but also significantly reduces production waste. By keeping designs elegant and unembellished, Fjords ensures fewer replacements over time resulting in less environmental impact and enduring beauty.

Their sustainable approach merges simplicity with durability, affirming that true elegance lies in thoughtful materials, ethical sourcing, and design that stands the test of time.

The Nordic REST Collection offers sleek, hassle-free sofa beds that elegantly transition from seated comfort to restful sleep. Crafted for modern living, each piece blends effortless convenience with refined design tailored to reflect your personal style.

With a wide range of options in colors, fabrics, styles, and finishes, you can choose a piece that perfectly reflects your taste. Designed to suit your space, it’s furniture made truly yours.

Built with superior craftsmanship and lasting durability, these sofa beds are made to serve you for years to come. Whether for hosting guests or elevating everyday living, the Nordic REST Collection is where function meets timeless design.
